```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(GGally)
library(ggcorrplot)
```

```{r}
df_communes<- read.csv('data/DOI/OGR_Communes.csv',colClasses=c(INSEE_COM='character',CODE_COM='character',CODE_DEPT='character',CODE_ARR='character')) %>% select(CODE_COM,INSEE_COM,NOM_COM,CODE_ARR,CODE_DEPT,NOM_DEPT,CODE_REG,NOM_REG)

df_communes<-df_communes %>%  mutate(CODE_COM=str_pad(CODE_COM, 3, pad = "0"))
df_communes<-df_communes %>%  mutate(CODE_ARR=str_pad(CODE_ARR, 3, pad = "0"))
df_communes<-df_communes %>%  unite(CODGEO_ARR,CODE_DEPT,CODE_ARR,sep = '')


str(df_communes)

```
### Combine with votes :

```{r}
df_votes.2017<-read.csv('data/DOI/pres_1erTour_2017_commune_candidat.csv',stringsAsFactors = F)
df_votes.2017<-df_votes.2017 %>%  mutate(CODE_COM=str_pad(Code.de.la.commune, 3, pad = "0"))
df_votes.2017<-df_votes.2017 %>%  mutate(CODE_DEPT=str_pad(Code.du.département, 2, pad = "0"))
df_votes.2017<-df_votes.2017 %>%  unite(GEOCODE_COM,CODE_DEPT,CODE_COM,sep = '')
df_votes.2017<- df_votes.2017 %>% select(-Code.de.la.commune,-Libellé.de.la.commune,-Code.du.département,-Libellé.du.département)

df.all<-merge(df_communes,df_votes.2017,by.x='INSEE_COM',by.y='GEOCODE_COM',all.x=TRUE)
str(df.all)
df.all %>% filter(INSEE_COM=='32009')
```

### Combine with Population and add Unemployment rate

```{r}

df.emploi.COM<-read.csv('data/DOI/base_cc_emploi_pop_active_13_COM.csv',stringsAsFactors = F, colClasses=c(CODGEO='character'))
df.emploi.COM<- df.emploi.COM %>% mutate(CODGEO=str_pad(CODGEO, 5, pad = "0"))

add_employment_stats <- function(df){
 df<- df %>% select(CODGEO,P13_ACT1564,P13_ACT1524,P13_ACT2554,P13_ACT5564,P13_CHOM1564
,P13_HCHOM1564,P13_HCHOM1524,P13_HCHOM2554,P13_HCHOM5564,P13_FCHOM1564,P13_FCHOM1524,P13_FCHOM2554,P13_FCHOM5564,C13_ACT1564_CS1,C13_ACT1564_CS2,C13_ACT1564_CS3,C13_ACT1564_CS4,C13_ACT1564_CS5,C13_ACT1564_CS6,P13_ETUD1564,P13_RETR1564)

df <- df %>% mutate(NoJob_all=P13_CHOM1564/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>%mutate(NoJob_1524=(P13_HCHOM1524+P13_FCHOM1524)/P13_ACT1524)
df <- df %>%mutate(NoJob_2554=(P13_HCHOM2554+P13_FCHOM2554)/P13_ACT2554)
df <- df %>%mutate(NoJob_5564=(P13_HCHOM5564+P13_FCHOM5564)/P13_ACT5564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_AGRO=C13_ACT1564_CS1/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_ARTISAN=C13_ACT1564_CS2/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_CADRE=C13_ACT1564_CS3/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_INTERMED=C13_ACT1564_CS4/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_EMPLOYE=C13_ACT1564_CS5/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Job_OUVRIER=C13_ACT1564_CS6/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Etudiants=P13_ETUD1564/P13_ACT1564)
df <- df %>% mutate(Retraites=P13_RETR1564/P13_ACT1564) 

return(df)
}

df.emploi.COM<-add_employment_stats(df.emploi.COM)
df.all<-merge(df.all,df.emploi.COM,by.x='INSEE_COM',by.y='CODGEO',suffixes=c('','_COM'),all.x=TRUE)
df.all %>% filter(grepl('ROSTR',NOM_COM))
df.all %>% filter(INSEE_COM=='01001')
```

### Clean features and save
```{r}
# Remove demographic classes data
df.all.clean<-df.all %>% select(-contains('C11')) %>% select(-contains('P11'))

# add Ratio

Nb.Columns<- grep('Nb.',colnames(df.all.clean),value = T)
Ratio.Nb <- gsub("Nb.", "Ratio.", Nb.Columns)

df.all.clean<-df.all.clean %>% mutate_each(funs(ratio=log(./Population+1)),contains('Nb.'))

write.csv(df.all.clean,'data/DOI/elections_2017_First_round.csv')

```

